subject: Some great EVP

I have uploaded a few of my recent evp recorded on my olympus handheld from=
 my circle group meeting we held when Keith Clark came down to visit us. It=
 was great to meet him and Deborah Preece after knowing them both for so lo=
ng online! They are both as passionate about this subject as I am.
=A0
I al=
so uploaded some fantastic evp I recorded on the 4th of July out in my yard=
 alone (if one is ever really alone LOL I think the voices contradict that =
statement). Almost all voices were quite loud and clear for my ears and req=
uired no filter or enhancement.=A0You can listen to them=A0here:
=A0
http:/=
/www.esnips.com/web/NewEVPVoices
=A0
Enjoy!
Misty
